name: Gang Lords 3D
description:
Gang Lords 3D - One of the best action games based on crimes and criminals life.

Intro: In this game you are a real city gangster - hero, who is not afraid of anything. Savage, aggressive criminals are everywhere. They shoot, kill people, rob banks and stores. There is a criminal chaos in the city.
It's time to show everyone who’s boss by shooting rivals and ruling the streets. You are not a policeman. You are a gangster, who don't need glory - you have a greed for revenge. You have a big gun and must kill as much as possible bandits with guns, knifes and other weapons.

Capture whole city by shooting and killing innocent citizen of San Andres. While unexpected dangerous chaos in the city; criminals Shooting, robbing and killing the innocents.

You're a real street fighter, just escape from getting killed by bandits. Be an angry citizen and plot a revenge against all the killers. Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery.

Freely move around the city shooting and killing all the enemies around you to kill.

Keep your guns ready - Load, Aim and Shoot!


Gang Lords 3D is action packed with 20 exciting missions. When you are driving around in city you can look on the minimap for missions or you can use the quick buttons to start right away a mission.

Gang Lords 3D Features:

* HD Graphics
* Cool Animations & Sounds
* Real Crime Game Simulator
* Dangerous Guns & Vehicles



Want to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals? Get ready to show everyone who’s boss by fighting in open world real action game. Rule the streets in this action-packed game.


AN ARSENAL OF WEAPONS
Choose from a gun store: Machine Guns, RPGs, Sniper Rifles and Shotguns.

WHAT's NEW
-> Helicopter and Aircraft physics
-> Most realistic city traffic and crowd simulation

Gang Lords 3D In this full action pack realistic gangster and mafia game, you need to control your player and explore the city in Miami. Gang Lords 3D is not just another miami crime simulator game, Gang Lords 3D In this full action pack realistic gangster and mafia game.

Exciting car thief simulator.
Rich 3D graphics and special effects.
New map and quests!
Best guns and ammunition. Try out all the weapon arsenal!
Reworked helicopter and jets.
Destroyable cars.
This game brings you to the streets of New Vegas full of gangsters, cops and special force soldiers. Show no mercy to everyone who stands on your way! Unlock all the weapons and find secrets hidden on the map.
